entry.title: Re The only pool that is live atm is a multi-asset pool meaning that akthough you can deposit only one token (e.g $WBTC, $USDC or $ETH) you will be ex...
entry.summary: Re The only pool that is live atm is a multi-asset pool meaning that akthough you can deposit only one token (e.g $WBTC, $USDC or $ETH) you will be exposed to all three. However, you will get the same amounts out as you put in.
